title: Transformative and Transcendent Learning Design Course for Net Generation Language Practitioners: Strengthening Text Analysis and Writing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language proficiency (reading, writing, listening, speaking) and practical work experience, with basic competency in digital text analysis
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining smartphone-based collaboration tools with offline activities. Strengthen language skills using digital text analysis tools (e.g., lexical frequency analysis, grammar checks) and writing feedback systems (e.g., AI-based proofreading). Focus on enhancing expressive, reading comprehension, and critical thinking skills.

learning_goals: Learners can improve practical language skills (specialized vocabulary, grammatical structures, creative expression) by over 30% through project execution.
Learners can apply self-directed problem-solving strategies two or more times in digital tool-based collaborative projects and strengthen text structure analysis and academic writing skills.
Learners can systematically analyze their language learning process through reflective journaling and develop reading comprehension strategies and writing improvement plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
